name: Return: Unknown
storyline:
Welcome to Return: Unknown – Your ultimate fight for survival begins now!
Immerse yourself in an apocalyptic world where relentless infected beings and ruthless players alike challenge your survival instincts. Choose between the third and first-person perspectives as your character battles through thirst, hunger, and exhaustion.

Explore the post-apocalyptic landscape, combat zombies, and rival survivors. Utilize farming, construct buildings from diverse materials, and forge deadly weapons, tools, and luxurious furniture.

Your survival hinges on skilled hunting and efficient harvesting. Cook, melt raw materials, and gather a plethora of resources. Experience a dynamic weather system with seasons and an ever-changing day and night cycle. Be prepared to adapt to challenging weather conditions at any moment.

Trade and sell valuable resources to accelerate your progress and become the ultimate survivor.

Are you ready to face the unknown? Embrace the challenge and shape your destiny in Return: Unknown – where the apocalypse meets explosive creativity, and survival demands the ultimate price.
summary: Welcome to Return: Unknown, a survival-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic Manhattan. Once a thriving metropolis, now abandoned by civilization after the outbreak of a global virus, it offers both challenges and countless possibilities.
